amendment.description: Page 35, insert the following new section after line 11: \ SEC. 311. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to finance laboratory directed research and development activities at Department of Energy laboratories on behalf of other Federal agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section 311 providing that none of the funds may be used to finance laboratory directed research and development activities at Department of Energy laboratories on behalf of other Federal agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hobson amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Hobson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hobson amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
